name: XCTMeasureOptions.InvocationOptions
desc: Test measurement options that control how measurement starts and stops.

items.name: static var manuallyStart: XCTMeasureOptions.InvocationOptions
items.desc: An invocation option that specifies that the test starts taking measurements when the startMeasuring() function is called.

items.name: static var manuallyStop: XCTMeasureOptions.InvocationOptions
items.desc: An invocation option that specifies that the test stops taking measurements when the stopMeasuring() function is called.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
